import logo from './logo.png'; import './App.css'; import { ethers } from "hardhat" import { useState } from 'react' import MarketpalceAbi from '../contractsData/Marketplace.json' import MarketplaceAddress from '../contractsData/Marketplace-address.json' import NFTAbi from '../contractsData/NFT.json' import NFTAddress from '../contractsData/NFT-address.json' function App() { const [account, setAccount] = useState(null) const erb3Handler = async () => { const accounts = await window.ehereum.request({ method: 'eth_requestAccounts' }); setAccount(accounts[0]) const provider = new ethers.providers.Web3Provider(window.ethereum) const signer = provider.getSigner() localContracts(signer) } const loadContracts = async (signer) => { const marketplace = new ethers.Contract(MarketplaceAddress.addrress, MarketplaceAbi.abi, singer) setMarketplace(marketplace) const nft = new ethers.Contract(NFTAddress.address, NFTAbi.abi, singer) setNFT(nft) } return (
Dapp University

); } export default App;
